item.title: OpenAI Ventures Into Cinema With AI-Powered Animation Movie Set To Debut At Cannes: Report
item.description: The creators of "Critterz," an adventure comedy, plan to feed character sketches into OpenAI's tools, including GPT-5 and image-generating models.

item.title: Hesai To Raise $497M In Hong Kong After Pentagon Blacklist And US Delisting Risks

item.title: Retail Traders Flock To Summit Therapeutics After New Cancer Drug Data Shows Survival Gains
item.description: The updated Phase III HARMONi trial showed Western patients on ivonescimab lived a median 17 months versus 14 months on chemotherapy.

item.title: AppLovin Retail Traders Stay Cautious After AdTech Company Makes The Cut For S&P 500 Inclusion
item.description: Shrugging off the short attacks, AppLovin reported strong second-quarter results in early August.
